about_the_game:
Attention Personnel:

“Stand to attention soldiers! We are looking a harsh new reality right down the barrel - the world is a post apocalyptic nightmare, all that’s left of humanity is pockets of survivors and organised military bases like ourselves. We prepared for this situation, the necessary equipment and resources were stockpiled long ago, knowing it was only a matter of 'when' and not 'if'. But we have a plan, an ambitious plan to wipe this zombie scourge from the face of the planet.

The enemy are no longer human, they are no longer your parents, siblings or friends, they are an organism of pure evil that seeks only to spread, mutate and destroy - its foul stench must be eliminated at any cost! We are looking for five volunteers to execute this plan - five soldiers to step up for what is almost certainly a suicide mission; which of you have the bravery and skills to get out there and meet this challenge face to ugly rotting face?”

- Colonel Johnson, CURE HQ.

About CURE II:

Codename CURE II is an upcoming, free-to-play, co-operative, first person shooter set in the
aftermath of a zombie apocalypse. Assemble an elite military squad of up to five players
(or play offline with bots), and fight your way through hordes of infected in a variety
of dynamic objective missions, offering a truly unique experience with each play through.

  • Choose between five distinct player classes; Pointman, Support, Assault, Technician, and Sniper, each featuring their own unique arsenal, abilities and play style.
  • Embark on various missions, featuring diverse objectives and dynamic maps, which ensure no two missions are ever the same; be prepared for anything.
  • More infected enemy types; battle against a bigger variety of zombies than ever before; from commons and fallen soldiers to enemies with distinct abilities, adapting the gameplay as you fight the infestation.
  • Reactive gore system; making neutralising enemies feel truly satisfying.
  • Personalize your soldier; stand out in the field with a variety of uniforms, helmets and gloves.
  • Modify your arsenal with weapon attachments, skins, and more; as well as equip new guns altogether from a growing selection of weapons.
  • Recoup and plan your missions back at CURE HQ, where you and your squad can gear up, try out new weapons, customisation, and track your progress climbing the ranks between missions.

...and even more is planned, so watch this space!

content_descriptors.notes: Zombie shooter, contains killing and violence with blood and gore

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1200, Intel Core-i5 3570k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950, Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5600X, Intel Core-i5 10600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3070, Radeon RX 6800XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
